    • Method Detail

      • moveOn

        public LatLon moveOn(double distance)
        Move agent on the current arc. Reaches nodes of the plan as required while crossing the specified distance.
        Specified by:
        moveOn in class GeoMover
        Parameters:
        distance - distance to move
        Returns:
        new geographical position

      • updateAgentSpeed

        protected void updateAgentSpeed(GeoAgentBody agentBody)
        Called immediately when the moveOn() function is called. By default, will keep the agent speed constant. Can be use to manage acceleration depending on environment perceptions.
        Parameters:
        agentBody - Moving agent body

      • addGeoMoveEventListener

        public void addGeoMoveEventListener(EventHandler<GeoMoveEvent> listener)
        Adds a new GeoMoveEvent handler.

        Triggered each time the car moves : can be triggered several times in the same tick, depending on the tick duration and the agent speed.

        Such events can be used to handle crossed distance because sent events containes geographical information, whereas classic move event do not.

        Parameters:
        listener - new car moved event handler to add
